articles.title: West Ham want Jude Bellingham-style money for Declan Rice - The Telegraph
articles.description: The club are resigned to the fact that their captain will leave in the summer but will be sure to get the best price possible
articles.content: If Bellinghams fee is as high then West Ham will claim Rice should go for a similar price although, as yet, the indications are no team will bid such an amount. Arsenal appear to be Rices most likely… [+963 chars]

articles.author: Andrew McLean
articles.title: Jose Mourinho could raid Man Utd and Chelsea for six stars as PSG step up pursuit - Express
articles.description: Jose Mourinho has been linked with the PSG job and may want to target Manchester United and Chelsea players if he gets it.
